Posts.Content: Hello Grace 234,  I found your message very interesting.  I have just been recentily diagnosed with mestastatis cancer of the liver and spine.  I had breast cance alomost 11 years ago with no reoccurence till now.  I am very worried about this.  Do you think that the Vitamin C would help me.  How do you find someone that is food with alternatives?  ConnieMa
Posts.Title: alternative treatment to aromatase inhibitors

Posts.Content: Hi  What is the cancer diet that you referred to with mushrooms and berries.  I had breast cancer almost 11 years ago and I have just been diagnosed with mestatis to my liver and spine..I have started on radiation to my spine, but I'm not sure as to what to do about the liver.  My doctor is talking about chemotherapy...What else can I do to lick this?  Connie
Posts.Title: Metaplastic Breast Cancer has metasticized

Posts.Content: Hi  I just rad you message..It is so up lifting....I do have a few questions..What is the Protocol and "the tea" that you drink?  I have just been diagnosed with mestatis of my brast cancer to the liver and spine...Please educate me...Connie
Posts.Title: MIRACLE

Posts.Content: Hello,  I just read your message.  If I understood you right, you had your first metastatic cancer 13 year ago.  Ho were you able to go that long berfore you had another reoccurence?  I had my first diagnosis of breast cancer juist short of 11 years ago.  I have just be diagnosed with mestatic cancer of the liver and spine.  I just started radiation on my spine and my doctor plans to give me radiation for the liver.  I'm going to the University of Michgan for a second opinion as I really want to beat this.  I have reading the messages about the intravenious Vitamin C and other alternatives.  Whre do you find someone to help you with this?  Connie
Posts.Title: Metaplastic breast cancer
